name: 11:13 p.m.
description:
made for VimJam!

(audio is a bit weird on the web build, please download if you can <3)

-

controls: 

[< ]   [ >]  - walk

[ down ]  - crouch

[ space ] - jump

[ up ] - interact

- 

11:13 p.m.

remember before 11:13 - a game about collecting memories... and time loops within time loops...

-

one of the inspirations for this game came from a short concept project I made a while back

although it's something completely different now... the main gameplay and story evolved around the jam limitations and theme

-

by lunid ^^
